name: Holiday Solitaire Easter
description:
What has the Easter Bunny brought? The new Easter Solitaire!

Remove pairs of golden cards from the table, complete levels and unlock new locations. Can't win a solitaire deal on the first try? Not a problem! Send the remaining cards back into the deck and complete it on your second try! The final score will reflect the overall number of golden cards in each attempt! Improve your score: collect cards faster and a special multiplier will help you earn more coins. Use coins to buy bonuses in the store – jokers, shuffles and mulligans. They'll help you complete 120 levels of patience with the best score possible! Choose your difficulty mode and play with maximum comfort. Enjoy premium-level graphics, over 10 hours of gameplay, beautiful paintings and scrapbooking art, and pleasant, relaxing music. Happy Easter!

The Easter Bunny has brought a whole feast of fun:

- Holiday Easter solitaire for new players and experts alike!
- Unique game mechanics – choosing pairs of cards
- Use different bonuses - mulligan, shuffle, joker
- Collect gold cards to complete the level and unlock next location
- Collect bonus cards to get more coins and bonuses
- Collect cards fast - do combos and get good rewards
- 12 locations, 120 levels and several difficulty modes
- For daring players, we offer special achievements and trophies
- Easter spring setting
- Colorful high-quality graphics
- Original themed decks and 9 card backs
- Beautiful music that doesn't distract from gameplay
